title: Business Management
content:
At MSME Hub, we are dedicated to empowering micro, small, and medium enterprises with strategic guidance, financial expertise, and operational excellence. Our mission is to help businesses build a strong foundation for growth by offering tailored solutions that address real-world challenges. From ensuring efficient cash flow and reengineering business processes to managing human resources and providing Virtual CFO expertise, we focus on delivering value that drives progress, stability, and long-term success.

With a client-first approach and a deep understanding of diverse industries, we go beyond advisory to become your “Business का भरोसेमंद साथी.” Whether you are seeking to streamline operations, strengthen financial management, or make informed strategic decisions, we offer hands-on mentoring and expert insights every step of the way. At MSME Hub, we don’t just guide your business—we grow with it.

Why Choose us

Our suite of professional services is designed to strengthen your business foundation, optimize operations, and support strategic decision-making for sustainable growth.

  • Future among us
  • Business Growth Partner
  • Trusted MSME Consultant
  • Virtual CFO Services

Choosing MSME Hub means partnering with a team that truly understands the unique challenges and aspirations of growing businesses. We go beyond traditional consultancy — offering personalized, data-driven, and result-oriented solutions that empower your business to thrive in today’s competitive landscape. Our strength lies in our holistic approach, combining financial expertise, strategic planning, and operational efficiency under one roof. We don’t believe in one-size-fits-all strategies; instead, we take the time to understand your business model, industry dynamics, and long-term vision to craft solutions that deliver measurable impact. Backed by a team of experienced professionals and industry specialists, we ensure transparency, accuracy, and consistency in every engagement. From optimizing cash flow and improving processes to providing continuous mentoring and CFO-level guidance, we are your trusted partner in driving growth, enhancing profitability, and building a sustainable future. With MSME Hub by your side, you don’t just get a service provider — you gain a reliable ally committed to your success at every step.
description: Comprehensive business management solutions empowering MSMEs for sustainable growth.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Cash Flow Management
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide comprehensive cash-flow management services to help businesses maintain a strong financial position and smooth operations. Our approach includes proper planning of receivables and payables, ensuring that incoming cash from customers aligns with outgoing payments to suppliers and other commitments. We assist in matching payables with receivables to prevent cash shortages and maintain healthy liquidity. Additionally, we help identify gaps in working capital and recommend solutions to cover potential shortfalls, supporting your business’s financial stability and long-term growth.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Business Process Reengineering
ServiceAccordionData.text: We offer specialized Business Process Reengineering (BPR) services aimed at helping organizations optimize their operations and drive growth. Our services include a thorough analysis of existing processes to identify flaws, inefficiencies, and gaps that may hinder performance. We also study industry-specific best practices to ensure your processes are aligned with current standards. Based on these insights, we redesign and reengineer workflows to improve efficiency, reduce costs, and support business turnaround, enabling your organization to achieve sustainable growth and enhanced productivity.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Human Resource Management
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide tailored Human Resource Management services focused on connecting the expertise your business needs with the skills available in the right candidates. Our approach ensures that talent acquisition is aligned with your specific industry requirements, helping you build a workforce that supports your strategic goals. By understanding both your operational needs and the strengths of potential hires, we deliver customized HR solutions that drive performance, efficiency, and long-term success.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Virtual CFO Services
ServiceAccordionData.text: We offer comprehensive Virtual CFO services designed to provide strategic financial leadership without the need for a full-time, in-house CFO. Through regular virtual meetings, we ensure proper financial administration and managerial supervision, along with active participation in board meetings to support key decision-making. Our services include budget preparation, detailed accounts analysis, regular reviews, and accurate financial reporting to keep your business on track. Additionally, we help manage revenue streams effectively, ensuring sustainable growth and financial stability for your organization.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Hand Holding & Mentoring
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide dedicated Handholding & Mentoring services to support businesses with trusted guidance in their day-to-day operations. As your “Business का भरोसेमंद साथी” we assist in making informed decisions, whether operational or financial, ensuring you have expert advice at every step. Our goal is to help you navigate challenges, streamline processes, and build a strong foundation for sustainable growth with the confidence of having an experienced partner by your side.

title: Funding Solutions
content:
At MSME Hub, we specialize in empowering businesses with a complete spectrum of financial and strategic services — from Private Equity and Debt Syndication to IPO Listing, Business Valuation, and Seed Funding. Our approach is built on connecting promising enterprises with the right investors, bankers, and ecosystem partners, ensuring that funding is not just about capital but also about strategic mentorship and long-term growth. Whether you're a startup seeking your first round of seed funding or an established company preparing for IPO, we provide end-to-end solutions that align with your business goals, ensuring smooth execution, compliance, and success.

Through our strong network of high-net-worth investors (HNIs), banking institutions, merchant bankers, and legal partners, we deliver tailored financial solutions that drive real impact. Our Private Equity services help you attract strategic investors who bring both capital and industry expertise, while our Debt Syndication ensures efficient, well-structured financing through trusted banking relationships. From conducting professional Business Valuations to facilitating Main Board and SME IPO listings, our team handles every step with precision and transparency. With a deep understanding of capital markets and financial ecosystems, we position your business for sustainable success — guiding you through every stage of your funding journey with confidence and clarity.

Why Choose us

Partnering with MSME Hub means choosing a team that blends financial expertise, strategic insight, and execution excellence. We ensure your business not only secures capital but also leverages it effectively for expansion and sustainability.

  • Access to Trusted Investor
  • End-to-End Financial Structuring
  • Proven Expertise in Private Equity
  • Strategic Mentorship
  • Transparent Process

Choosing MSME Hub means working with a dedicated team that understands the nuances of capital markets and financial structuring. We combine industry expertise, regulatory know-how, and strategic vision to deliver end-to-end solutions — from equity fundraising and debt syndication to valuations and IPO execution. Our client-first philosophy ensures personalized service, confidentiality, and measurable outcomes. With MSME Hub, you gain more than a financial advisor — you gain a growth partner committed to helping your business achieve its full potential, expand sustainably, and thrive in a competitive landscape.
description: Tailored capital and strategic funding to accelerate MSME growth journeys.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Private Equity
ServiceAccordionData.text: We offer specialized Private Equity services by connecting promising businesses with our pool of private investors, including well-connected HNIs, and industry players who not only invest but also mentor. With access to a diverse network of investors actively seeking the right opportunities, we help businesses secure strategic funding for growth and expansion. Our approach ensures that along with capital, you gain valuable industry expertise and guidance, making us a reliable partner in your business’s success journey.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Debt-Syndication
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide end-to-end Debt Syndication services to help businesses secure the right funding through our strong network of major banking partners. Our team handles complete coordination with banks, ensuring smooth communication, efficient documentation, and timely approvals. With our expertise and relationships in the banking sector, we work to structure optimal financing solutions tailored to your business needs, supporting growth while minimizing delays and ensuring a hassle-free borrowing experience.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Main board & SME listing
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide complete Main Board IPO and SME IPO listing services, helping businesses successfully enter the capital markets. In collaboration with our trusted partner merchant bankers and experienced legal firms, we offer end-to-end support from initial planning and regulatory compliance to documentation and execution. Whether it’s a Main Board IPO or an SME IPO, we ensure a smooth, efficient, and timely listing process, enabling companies to raise capital, enhance market presence, and drive future growth.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Business Valuation
ServiceAccordionData.text: We offer professional Business Valuation services to help you determine the true worth of your company, whether for fundraising, mergers and acquisitions, compliance, or strategic decision-making. Using proven methodologies and industry insights, we provide accurate, objective, and comprehensive valuations that reflect your business’s financial health and market potential. Our expertise ensures you have a clear understanding of your company’s value, supporting informed decisions and long-term growth strategies.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Seed Funding
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide end-to-end Seed Funding services, supporting startups right from registration to securing their first round of funding. With our strong network of incubators, investors, and ecosystem partners, we help early-stage ventures connect with the right opportunities for growth. From setting up your startup to preparing investment pitches/ pitch decks and facilitating funding discussions, we ensure a smooth journey towards raising capital and building a strong foundation for future success.

title: Global Business Solutions
content:
At MSME Hub, we empower businesses to go global with confidence through our comprehensive international business services — including Company Incorporation, International Market Entry & Expansion, Export Advisory, Global Trade Finance, and Foreign Investment Advisory. Whether you’re setting up operations abroad or exploring cross-border trade opportunities, our expert team ensures compliance with global regulations while streamlining every aspect of your international business journey. From structuring overseas entities and securing approvals to managing export-import licenses and trade documentation, we make global expansion a seamless and strategic experience.

Our experienced professionals, including Company Secretaries and financial experts, provide jurisdiction-specific guidance tailored to your business goals. We assist in incorporating companies in major global markets, managing international trade finance through trusted banking partners, and mitigating currency and investment risks with effective hedging solutions. Our Export Advisory helps you unlock global market potential by facilitating GST LUT, tax refunds, and duty credit trading, while our Foreign Investment Advisory connects you with international capital opportunities and portfolio strategies. At MSME Hub, we combine regulatory expertise, financial acumen, and strategic insights to ensure that your business achieves sustainable global growth.

Why Choose us

Choosing MSME Hub means gaining a trusted global partner dedicated to helping your business expand internationally with ease, compliance, and strategic precision.

  • Expert Guidance
  • End-to-End Support for International Expansion
  • Strong Network of Global Banking
  • Foreign Investment Advisory
  • Risk Mitigation

At MSME Hub, we don’t just help you expand internationally — we ensure your business is equipped to succeed globally. Our integrated approach covers legal, financial, and operational aspects, giving you a single-window solution for incorporation, export, and foreign investment. With a deep understanding of international markets and regulatory frameworks, we deliver personalized strategies that minimize risk and maximize opportunity. Whether you are exploring new territories or diversifying your portfolio abroad, MSME Hub stands as your reliable partner in global business excellence.
description: Enabling seamless international market entry, compliance, trade finance and expansion.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Company Incorporation
ServiceAccordionData.text: We offer assistance in incorporating companies outside India, ensuring compliance with international regulations and local laws. Our experienced CS team provides guidance on selecting the appropriate business structure, managing documentation, and securing necessary approvals. With a clear understanding of jurisdiction-specific requirements, we help streamline the incorporation process, making international market entry smooth and efficient.

ServiceAccordionData.title: International Market Entry and Expansion
ServiceAccordionData.text: We assist MSMEs in expanding their operations to international markets by providing end-to-end support in registrations, licenses, and legal compliance. Our experts guide businesses in navigating export-import regulations, securing approvals, and establishing operations in global business hubs and special zones. From market research to operational setup, we ensure a seamless international expansion journey.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Export Advisory
ServiceAccordionData.text: Our export advisory service offers specialized assistance to businesses seeking to expand into global markets. We help obtain export licenses and necessary approvals, manage LUT for GST, and facilitate tax refunds. Additionally, we provide guidance on duty credit trading and unlock benefits for export-oriented businesses. Our goal is to ensure smooth, compliant, and profitable international trade operations.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Global Trade Finance
ServiceAccordionData.text: Accessing reliable global trade finance is crucial for cross-border business success. Our specialized partners and established banking relationships offer secure financing options, including letters of credit and bank guarantees. We assist in managing currency fluctuation risks through effective hedging solutions, ensuring cost-effective international trade finance. Our solutions provide stability and liquidity for your global transactions.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Foreign Investment Advisory Services
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide expert foreign investment advisory services to help businesses explore international capital markets and make informed investment decisions. Our experienced professionals offer insights on market trends, risk assessment, and portfolio management. Additionally, we assist in hedging foreign exchange risks to protect your investments from currency fluctuations. With our guidance, businesses can optimize their global investment strategies.

title: Growth Bound MSMEs
description: Accelerating emerging MSMEs with strategic support, operational excellence, and scalability.
content:
At MSME Hub, we help growth-oriented MSMEs achieve sustainable expansion through strategic business advisory and funding facilitation. Our experts collaborate with you to identify new opportunities, improve operational efficiency, and design structured growth plans that align with your business goals. From strengthening market presence to exploring diversification strategies, we provide actionable insights that drive measurable results and long-term success.

Our integrated approach supports MSMEs across every stage of their growth journey — from accessing funding and forming strategic partnerships to upgrading processes and preparing for IPOs. With deep financial expertise, strong industry networks, and technology-driven solutions, MSME Hub ensures your business scales seamlessly while maintaining compliance, competitiveness, and innovation in an ever-evolving market landscape.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Business Growth Advisory
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide strategic advisory to identify new opportunities, build industry connections, and craft growth plans that ensure sustainable development.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Growth Funding Facilitation
ServiceAccordionData.text: Our experts connect MSMEs with suitable investors, lenders, and funding programs, ensuring smooth financial access and support for business expansion.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Partnerships and Business Deals
ServiceAccordionData.text: We create collaborative business opportunities by connecting MSMEs with potential partners and stakeholders to drive innovation and growth.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Technology & Process Upgradation
ServiceAccordionData.text: Enhance efficiency with process optimization, workflow automation, and next-gen technology integration to stay competitive and agile.

ServiceAccordionData.title: IPO & Capital Markets Readiness
ServiceAccordionData.text: From IPO readiness assessment to DRHP/RHP filings, our experts guide MSMEs through the entire process of capital market entry with compliance and confidence.

title: Stressed MSME’s
content:
At MSME Hub, we understand that financial challenges can put even the most promising businesses under immense pressure. Our Stressed MSME Solutions are designed to help businesses recover, restructure, and regain control with the right financial and legal support. From resolving NPAs and securing alternative funding to navigating insolvency and liquidation procedures, we provide complete end-to-end assistance tailored to each business’s situation.

Our team of experts, including Chartered Accountants, Company Secretaries, and Insolvency Professionals, ensures that every case is handled strategically and transparently. We focus on long-term sustainability by negotiating settlements, managing regulatory compliance, and developing revival strategies. Whether you are seeking asset reconstruction, stress funding, or insolvency resolution, MSME Hub stands with you as a committed partner for financial recovery and business continuity.

Why Choose Us

Our specialized approach ensures MSMEs receive personalized recovery strategies, legal clarity, and access to the right financial channels to rebuild stability and confidence.

  • Expert Recovery Strategies
  • One-Time Settlement & Debt Restructuring
  • Legal & Insolvency Expertise
  • Confidential & Transparent Process

Choosing MSME Hub means partnering with professionals who understand the complexities of financial distress and are committed to helping your business emerge stronger. We combine strategic financial restructuring, legal guidance, and negotiation expertise to deliver real, measurable outcomes that restore confidence and continuity for your enterprise.
description: Revitalizing challenged MSMEs with turnaround strategies, financial recovery and support.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Asset Reconstruction
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide expert Asset Reconstruction services to help businesses manage and restructure their NPA (Non-Performing Asset) accounts. Our team specializes in negotiating One-Time Settlement (OTS) terms with banks, ensuring effective communication and strategic bargaining to secure the best possible resolution. With our expertise, we assist businesses in financial recovery, debt restructuring, and regaining stability for future growth.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Stressed Funding
ServiceAccordionData.text: We offer specialized Stressed Funding services to help businesses secure financial support during challenging times. Our team evaluates various funding options tailored to stressful situations, ensuring access to the right financial solutions when needed the most. With our expertise, we assist businesses in overcoming liquidity crises, stabilizing operations, and paving the way for recovery and growth.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Arbitration & Conciliation
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide expert Arbitration & Conciliation services, helping businesses resolve disputes efficiently and amicably. Our experienced team, with diverse expertise in arbitration, assists in navigating complex legal matters while ensuring fair and effective dispute resolution. Through structured conciliation and arbitration processes, we aim to minimize conflicts, reduce litigation costs, and achieve favorable outcomes for all parties involved.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Winding-Up & Liquidation
ServiceAccordionData.text: We offer comprehensive Winding Up & Liquidation services, assisting businesses in smoothly closing operations while ensuring full compliance with legal requirements. Our team provides expert guidance in the liquidation process, easing the complexities of winding up and fulfilling all ROC and MCA compliance obligations. With our structured approach, we help businesses navigate this transition efficiently and hassle-free.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Insolvency Resolution
ServiceAccordionData.text: We offer expert Insolvency Resolution services, led by experienced Insolvency Professionals, to help businesses navigate financial distress effectively. Our services include Corporate Insolvency Resolution Plans (CIRP) and Pre-Packaged Insolvency Resolution Plans (PIRP), ensuring structured and legally compliant solutions. With our strategic approach, we assist in debt restructuring, stakeholder negotiations, and seamless resolution, enabling businesses to recover or exit in an orderly manner.

title: Business Registration & Setup
content:
We assist businesses and entrepreneurs in establishing and expanding their presence both in India and abroad. Our Company Incorporation and Startup Advisory services ensure seamless registration, compliance, and documentation. Whether you are a startup seeking funding or an MSME planning global expansion, our team simplifies every step from planning to execution.

Our expertise covers international company incorporation, export compliance, foreign investment advisory, and global trade finance solutions. We help clients navigate complex regulations, obtain necessary approvals, and build a strong operational foundation in international markets. With strategic insights and reliable legal support, we make global business expansion efficient and compliant.

Why Choose Us

We combine legal precision, financial strategy, and international business insight to deliver 360° support for your company’s growth — from registration to global trade.

  • Expert Company Incorporation
  • Startup Advisory & Funding Guidance
  • Export & International Market Expansion
  • Foreign Investment & Trade Finance

Our mission is to empower businesses to go global with confidence. From company registration to trade finance, from branding to foreign investment, we provide trusted, end-to-end business support — ensuring compliance, efficiency, and growth at every stage of your international journey.
description: Simplifying business formation through expert registration, compliance, and setup assistance.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Company Incorporation
ServiceAccordionData.text: We assist in incorporating companies across jurisdictions, managing documentation, and ensuring compliance with MCA and international laws for a smooth setup.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Startup Advisory
ServiceAccordionData.text: Guidance for startup funding, Stand Up India schemes, and tax exemptions to build a sustainable foundation for growth.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Trademark, IP, and Patent Registration
ServiceAccordionData.text: Comprehensive support for protecting your intellectual property through trademark, IP, and patent filings.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Branding & Social Media Management
ServiceAccordionData.text: Build a strong brand identity and online presence through strategic branding and targeted social media campaigns.

title: Government Schemes/Subsidy
content:
We offer specialized services to help businesses identify and benefit from various Central and State Government Schemes. Our expert team researches, evaluates, and guides businesses through eligibility, documentation, and application processes to ensure maximum benefits from government initiatives and incentives.

From subsidies and incentives to industrial land allotment and licensing, our experienced professionals provide complete guidance, ensuring compliance and optimized outcomes for your business growth and expansion.
description: Helping MSMEs access government incentives, subsidies, and financial assistance .

ServiceAccordionData.title: Central & State Government Schemes
ServiceAccordionData.text: We help businesses discover and apply for suitable Central and State Government schemes. Our team handles research, eligibility analysis, documentation, and submission, ensuring you secure all applicable benefits and incentives.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Government Subsidies
ServiceAccordionData.text: Our experts assist in availing Central & State Government subsidies by performing eligibility checks, managing applications, and ensuring smooth processing for maximum financial support.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Industrial Land Allotment
ServiceAccordionData.text: We provide end-to-end support in securing industrial land, including application filing, compliance checks, and coordination with authorities to meet industry-specific requirements efficiently.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Industry-Specific Subsidies
ServiceAccordionData.text: We specialize in identifying and securing subsidies tailored to your industry, ensuring your business receives targeted financial incentives to promote growth and cost efficiency.

ServiceAccordionData.title: Licensing & Approvals
ServiceAccordionData.text: We assist in obtaining all necessary industry licenses and regulatory approvals—FSSAI, manufacturing, pollution control, GST registration, and more—ensuring compliance and uninterrupted operations.
